TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableHeaderRow extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow

summary.span: 表示 控件中的标题行。

span.span: Represents a heading row in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的标题行控件。The class represents a heading row in a control. 此类支持在具有有限的屏幕大小的设备上显示的表。This class supports displaying tables on devices with a limited screen size. 在这些设备上必须跨多页呈现具有许多列和行的表。On these devices, a table with many columns and rows must be rendered across multiple pages. 添加到控件，可作为显示表的视图的每一页上的第一行指定呈现的标题行。Adding a to a control allows you to specify a heading row that is rendered as the first row on each page that displays a view of the table. 有关设备的有限的屏幕大小上呈现的表的视图格式的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the view formats for a table rendered on a device with a limited screen size, see . A对象仅可包含对象。A object can contain only objects. 若要将内容添加到，必须添加一个或多个到行的对象。To add content to the , you must add one or more objects to the row. 然后，设置每个属性要指定每个单元格的内容的行中的对象。Then, set the property of each object in the row to specify the contents of each cell. 或者，你可以将控件添加到对象来指定其内容。Alternatively, you can add a control to a object to specify its contents. 你可以以编程方式管理中的单元格使用集合。You can programmatically manage the cells in the by using the collection. 集合是一个集合表示行中的单元格的对象。The collection is a collection of objects that represent the cells in the row. 继承属性从，可让你控制如何显示行中的内容。The inherits properties from that allow you to control how the contents in the row are displayed. 例如，你可以使用和属性以指定内容的对齐方式。For example, you can use the and properties to specify the alignment of the contents. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示用于创建的声明性语法具有控件和。The following code example demonstrates the declarative syntax for creating a control that has a and a . [!code-aspx-vb[TableHeaderRowClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableHeaderRowClass1/VB/tableheaderrowclass1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建具有控件和。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a control that has a and a . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[TableHeaderRowClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableHeaderRowClass2/CS/tableheaderrowclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TableHeaderRowClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableHeaderRowClass2/VB/tableheaderrowclass2vb.aspx#1)]
